topic.title: Where is ZeroMusic?
topic.body:
I'd like to build a site where I can share my music library.
I'd like it to have to same layout as 'Play'.
And...
I'd like so other users can addshare their music libraries to the mix (if they choose to do so).
Is this possible?
How does one go about making such a site?
I think this would be an awesome addition!
<]8^)

1_1CNWTRN6cn761Wyb4eauhUU8wiKgGSTMC7.body: S'il vous plaît , pardonnez mon égarement . Je suis un noob .
